auto_scheduling.title: Auto scheduling configuration
auto_scheduling.description: Select a weather entity and provide PV system configuration.

data_description.weather_entity_id: Weather entity of which to retrieve the forecast.

data_description.nominal_power_wp: The total Wp of the PV system
data_description.orientation: Select the direction the PV panels are facing towards. For panels that are placed East/West, select 'EW' for 50/50 distribution of the total Wp.
data_description.annual_efficiency_decrease: Enter the annual efficiency decrease in percent. Leave at `0` if unknown.
data_description.pv_installation_date: The (approximate) installation date to calculate the current system efficiency.

data_description.dhw_heat_loss_rate: The DHW boiler heat loss rate in Watts
data_description.dhw_boiler_energy_label: DHW boiler energy label. Used if heat loss rate is `0`, otherwise ignored.

dhw_auto_schedule.name: DHW auto scheduling
dhw_auto_schedule.description: Create a DHW schedule for the next day based on weather forecast and boiler/solar configuration. Requires a weather integration that provides solar irradiance (GHI) in hourly forecasts.
